author: Jon Teire
comment: I like this watch face a lot, simple and elegant. Perhaps and option to increase the size of the battery info as it's just suffering a little, in terms of legibility at the moment. A colour palette to change the background would be nice, or even a photo background option for unique customisation..
title: Nice Design

author: David Colvin
comment: Neat looking face. It's nice to change it up every now and then. At first I was disappointed that the "stamp" constantly shifted but then I found the setting to make it static. Now I'm happy!

author: William Garrison
comment: The watchface is kinda cute, but it gets boring quickly. I wish it had a setting not to shrink for card previews. Also, goes against the developer guidelines by adding a launcher icon for no reason.
title: Cute but grows tired

author: Shubham Chaudhary
comment: That matters more since watch I can easily see, phone battery I'll have to pull it out of pocket.
title: Phone battery instead

author: HB V
comment: Using Sony Smartphone 3 and the option for the face isn't available in my Android wear app.
title: Unable to see it on my phone

author: Joshua S
comment: Maybe have an option for different date formats (for example, have date written as 1 March 2016 instead of March 1, 2016)
title: Pretty good

author: Sergio Erick Castillo
comment: I really wish there was an option for phone battery %
title: Great and simple

author: Scott Louzon
comment: Has only what I want creatively displayed.
title: Simple

author: Jose Aguirre
comment: It sucks

author: Dheepak Rajendran
comment: Simple, elegant!

author: iris lim
comment: So beautiful  design｡^‿^｡

author: Angel R
comment: Why would you need access to photos if we can't add any images to the watch face? Uninstalling.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: It's not strictly my app using storage, it's Google Play Services which i'm using for example for push messages and analytics.

title: Simple, nice, but..

author: Rob McIlroy
comment: Would be even nicer if it didn't twitch about on the screen though. Can we have an option to turn that off? *update* amazing thank you! Such a quick response! :)

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Sure. I will implement that as soon as possible. Thank you, Maciej EDIT: I've uploaded 2.1 version few minutes ago :) Enjoy!

title: Nice

author: Matt Morgado
comment: Really like the watch face! Shows a concise amount of information. The customization makes it even better!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Matt, thank you! I'm happy to announce, that 2.0 update is already uploaded. Should be available in hours. Hope you'll like it!

author: Carl Grant
comment: Really like the new options. Thanks for this watch ⌚ face 😃
title: My favourite watch face

author: C English
comment: I kinda like it, but would really like the regular 12 hour option as well. Maybe next update?  Edit:  The 12 hour option is there and changes within the APP but it doesn't work, still showing 24h format on watch face?

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: 2.1 update with bug fixes already uploaded :)

author: Justin Sienkiewicz
comment: Thanks for the updates, love the changes.
title: Great watch face

author: Trevor Schmied
comment: I really like the idea of this watch face and theme but can we please get some more options!? In your display photos for this app it shows a black background and white text, so can we get these as options to put on the watch face? Also having a option to change between 24 and 12 hour clocks would be amazing. Please make this happen

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hi Trevor, your features request comes to life shortly. 2.0 update is already uploaded, will be ready to download soon. Hope you'll like it!

author: Hanzo Hasashi
comment: Only problems: no option to use 12h time (a minor issue), and the battery display is at the bottom of the screen, where it's always hidden or makes whatever card is there impossible to read when the face is inactive. Can you move the % display to the top of the watchface?  Being able to customize colors would be nice, but the current color scheme is fine also.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Hanzo, after a long time I can finally announce a big update to Date Stamp. It includes 12h time, battery display solution, and more. Hope you'll like it!

title: #Aesthetic

author: Brandon Reznik
comment: I wish there was a way to switch from the 24-hour format to a 12 hour format. Also, there is a large portion in the top of the screen that is unused. It's like the whole watch face should be shifted upwards on the screen, because when the cards are displayed it cuts right through the battery indicator on the watch face. Or maybe just switch the battery indicator to the top of the screen? LG G watch R.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Brandon. I've uploaded 2.0 update just minutes ago. It brings 12/24 hours time format switch and solves card-covering problem. Hope you'll like this and many more features!

title: Needs some work

author: Yossi Segev
comment: The small hour digit is blurry in ambient mode - some of the numbers are not clear enough (3, 5, 8, 9), so I can't really tell if it's 18:44 or 19:44, for example. Other than that - really love this face!
title: Almost great, one little problem

author: Nick C.
comment: Definitely one of my favourite digital displays. In ambient mode I find the washed out look of the numbers a bit hard to read sometimes but I understand this is the look you're going for. Looks good on round faces too like my G Watch R.
title: Very good

author: neil macmillan
comment: I saw in the preview images a black background version which is what I wanted but after installing I realize that's probably just the ambient mode and not something that I can choose to use.  Bummer!  With the white theme, I'm afraid it's going to really kill my battery with so many bright pixels.  I would happily bump this to 5 stars if you make the black theme an option :)

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Neil! Good news, an update will be ready soon. Already uploaded :)

author: Jordan Talbot
comment: Love the watchface. Please update it soon with customization! Also, what font is that? Anywhere I can find it? Thank you!
title: What font is that?

author: Richard Ely-Harris
comment: Effective yet quite simple. Would love to be able to play around with changing the colours of the face so I can use a slightly different one on different days.
title: Nice face

author: Keon Parsa
comment: Love it. Maybe add a thing to get rid of the battery %
title: Free

author: Evil Droid
comment: It's simple and effective. I really like this watch face. It's also unique
title: Great looking

author: Mackenzie Traynor
comment: I love this watch face but if you could not have to have it on milltary time then it would be 5 stars

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hi Mackenzie, 12h time format is coming in today's update :) stay tuned!

title: I love it but

author: James Morgan
comment: I like it alot BUT i dont do military  time can it be changed

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Customization options will be available with the next update :) Stay tuned EDIT: That wasn't the fastest update in the history of my development ;) but finally 2.0 is uploaded, and will be available for download soon :)

title: Great look

author: Don Parsons
comment: Doesn't work on Asus ZenWatch

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Additional feedback will be appreciated. mail: contact@atektura.watch EDIT: Hello Don, anything changed? Any progress?

author: Reynaldo Suarez
comment: I really like the face, but I can't get it to show with the black background, how do I do that.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: What you see on promo images is an ambient mode, but with the next update you'll have an option to choose from various color schemes, so stay tuned, it is coming soon :) EDIT: "soon" seems to be undefined, and was so long this time... but hopefully you'll enjoy 2.0 update which comes today! :) Thank you, Maciej

title: AWESOME

author: nick feltes
comment: Does what looks like and nothing more and that is all I want from it could not be more happy with it
title: Awsom

author: micah chappell
comment: No matter what I do I can't get it to set as my watch face

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Try to resync apps in Android Wear settings. If it won't help, please let me know, I'm here to help: contact@atektura.watch EDIT: Hello Micah, just a reminder, is it working for you yet?

title: I love it but can't figure out how to set it

author: Aung Khaing Oo
comment: It would be nice if time show with 12 hour.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: 12h time format and more are coming in 2.0 update which will be available to download today! :) Thank you, Maciej

author: Michael Beattie
comment: Good idea, but none of the settings would transfer to my watch, so stuck with white and twitching.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hi, sorry for having issues :( did that happen with both settings apps on phone and watch? Additional feedback will be appreciated: contact@atektura.watch

title: Sony smartwatch 3

author: John Montgomery
comment: Love simple faces with an outside the box design.
title: Great

author: Chirodipto Dutta
comment: Simple and does what it needs to
